section.title: Modules List
section.para: This page shows show a list of the instances of Modules in your site.

listitem.para: Module Name: The display name for the module.
Position: The template position that the module will display in.
Pages: Shows whether a module is dislpayed on all, various or no pages. Note this is not applicable to Administrator modules.
Checked Out: The name of a user if this record is checked out. You will not be able to edit an item if it is checked out by another user.
Reorder: Click the icons to move the record up or down in the list.

section.para: You "select" items by clicking the checkbox at the start of each row.
[+] Publish and Unpublish: Publishes or Unpublishes the selected item(s).
[1] Copy: makes a copy of the selected module.
[1] Edit: Edits the item. Clicking the linked name will also preform this function.
[+] Delete: Deletes a module. Note that you cannot delete the "last" module of a particular "type".
[0] - you can just click this icon, [1] - you select one item click the toolbar icon, [+] - you can select more than one item and click the toolbar icon.
